scripts.build: cargo build --manifest-path js/Cargo.toml --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --no-typescript --out-dir js --web js/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/wgpu.wasm && bsb -make-world
scripts.start: cargo build --manifest-path js/Cargo.toml --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --no-typescript --out-dir js --web js/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/wgpu.wasm && bsb -make-world -w
scripts.clean: rm -rf js/target && rm js/wgpu.js  && rm js/wgpu_bg.wasm && bsb -clean-world
